definitions: a twining plant with trumpet-shaped flowers. Several kinds are invasive weeds.

notes.text: Genera Convolvulus and Calystegia, family Convolvulaceae: several species, including the widespread hedge bindweed (or wild morning glory) (Calystegia or 'Convolvulus' sepium)

shortDefinitions: twining plant with trumpet-shaped flowers, several kinds

definitions: used in names of twining plants similar to bindweed, e.g. black bindweed.
shortDefinitions: used in names of similar twining plants
